zpa_cloud.description: Cloud to use PRODUCTION, BETA, GOV, PREVIEW or DEV

description.description: Description of the App Connector Group

dns_query_type.description: Whether to enable IPv4 or IPv6, or both, for DNS resolution of all applications in the App Connector Group

enabled.description: Whether this App Connector Group is enabled or not

latitude.description: Latitude of the App Connector Group. Integer or decimal. With values in the range of -90 to 90

location.description: Location of the App Connector Group

longitude.description: Longitude of the App Connector Group. Integer or decimal. With values in the range of -180 to 180

name.description: Name of the App Connector Group

override_version_profile.description: Whether the default version profile of the App Connector Group is applied or overridden. Supported values: true, false

tcp_quick_ack_app.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

tcp_quick_ack_assistant.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

tcp_quick_ack_read_assistant.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

upgrade_day.description: App Connectors in this group will attempt to update to a newer version of the software during this specified day. List of valid days (i.e., Sunday, Monday)

upgrade_time_in_secs.description: App Connectors in this group will attempt to update to a newer version of the software during this specified time. Integer in seconds (i.e., -66600). The integer should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than 86400, in 15 minute intervals

version_profile_id.description: ID of the version profile. To learn more, see Version Profile Use Cases. This value is required, if the value for overrideVersionProfile is set to true

version_profile_name.description: Name of the version profile. To learn more, see Version Profile Use Cases. This value is required, if the value for overrideVersionProfile is set to true

bypass_type.description: Indicates whether users can bypass ZPA to access applications.

description.description: Description of the application.

double_encrypt.description: Whether Double Encryption is enabled or disabled for the app.

enabled.description: Whether this application is enabled or not.

health_reporting.description: Whether health reporting for the app is Continuous or On Access. Supported values: NONE, ON_ACCESS, CONTINUOUS.

is_cname_enabled.description: Indicates if the Zscaler Client Connector (formerly Zscaler App or Z App) receives CNAME DNS records from the connectors.

name.description: Name of the application.

tcp_port_ranges.description: TCP port ranges used to access the app.

udp_port_ranges.description: UDP port ranges used to access the app.

block.description: List of the server group IDs.

bypass_type.description: Indicates whether users can bypass ZPA to access applications. Default: NEVER. Supported values: ALWAYS, NEVER, ON_NET. The value NEVER indicates the use of the client forwarding policy.

description.description: Description of the application.

double_encrypt.description: Whether Double Encryption is enabled or disabled for the app.

health_reporting.description: Whether health reporting for the app is Continuous or On Access. Supported values: NONE, ON_ACCESS, CONTINUOUS.

is_cname_enabled.description: Indicates if the Zscaler Client Connector (formerly Zscaler App or Z App) receives CNAME DNS records from the connectors.

name.description: Name of the application.

tcp_port_ranges.description: TCP port ranges used to access the app.

udp_port_ranges.description: UDP port ranges used to access the app.

allow_options.description: If you want ZPA to forward unauthenticated HTTP preflight OPTIONS requests from the browser to the app.

domain.description: Domain name or IP address of the BA app.

trust_untrusted_cert.description: Indicates whether Use Untrusted Certificates is enabled or disabled for a BA app.

block.description: List of the server group IDs.

address.description: This field defines the domain or IP address of the server.

app_server_group_ids.description: This field defines the list of server groups IDs.

description.description: This field defines the description of the server.

enabled.description: This field defines the status of the server.

name.description: This field defines the name of the server.

control_rule_json.description: The control rule in JSON format that has the conditions and type of control for the inspection control

default_action_value.description: This is used to provide the redirect URL if the default action is set to REDIRECT

description.description: Description of the custom control

paranoia_level.description: OWASP Predefined Paranoia Level. Range: [1-4], inclusive

type.description: Rules to be applied to the request or response type

block.description: Name of the inspection profile

names.description: Name of the rules. If rules.type is set to REQUEST_HEADERS, REQUEST_COOKIES, or RESPONSE_HEADERS, the rules.name field is required.

lhs.description: Signifies the key for the object type

rhs.description: Denotes the value for the given object type. Its value depends on the key.

block.description: Rules of the custom controls applied as conditions (JSON)

description.description: Description of the LSS configuration

enabled.description: Whether this LSS configuration is enabled or not. Supported values: true, false

filter.description: Filter for the LSS configuration. Format given by the following API to get status codes: /mgmtconfig/v2/admin/lssConfig/statusCodes

format.description: Format of the log type. Format given by the following API to get formats: /mgmtconfig/v2/admin/lssConfig/logType/formats

name.description: Name of the LSS configuration

source_log_type.description: Log type of the LSS configuration

block.description: App Connector Group(s) to be added to the LSS configuration

action.description: This is for providing the rule action.

name.description: This is the name of the policy.

values.description: This denotes a list of values for the given object type. The value depend upon the key. If rhs is defined this list will be ignored

app_connector_group_name.description: Read only property. Applicable only for GET calls, ignored in PUT/POST calls.

association_type.description: Specifies the provisioning key type for App Connectors or ZPA Private Service Edges. The supported values are CONNECTOR_GRP and SERVICE_EDGE_GRP.

enabled.description: Whether the provisioning key is enabled or not. Supported values: true, false

enrollment_cert_id.description: ID of the enrollment certificate that can be used for this provisioning key.

enrollment_cert_name.description: Read only property. Applicable only for GET calls, ignored in PUT/POST calls.

max_usage.description: The maximum number of instances where this provisioning key can be used for enrolling an App Connector or Service Edge.

name.description: Name of the provisioning key.

provisioning_key.description: read only field. Ignored in PUT/POST calls.

zcomponent_id.description: ID of the existing App Connector or Service Edge Group.

zcomponent_name.description: Read only property. Applicable only for GET calls, ignored in PUT/POST calls.

description.description: Description of the app group.

enabled.description: Whether this app group is enabled or not.

name.description: Name of the app group.

description.description: This field is the description of the server group.

dynamic_discovery.description: This field controls dynamic discovery of the servers.

enabled.description: This field defines if the server group is enabled or disabled.

name.description: This field defines the name of the server group.

block.description: List of app-connector IDs.
This field is a json array of app-connector-id only.

This field is a list of servers that are applicable only when dynamic discovery is disabled. Server name is required only in cases where the new servers need to be created in this API. For existing servers, pass only the serverId.

description.description: Description of the Service Edge Group.

enabled.description: Whether this Service Edge Group is enabled or not.

is_public.description: Enable or disable public access for the Service Edge Group.

latitude.description: Latitude for the Service Edge Group.

location.description: Location for the Service Edge Group.

longitude.description: Longitude for the Service Edge Group.

name.description: Name of the Service Edge Group.

override_version_profile.description: Whether the default version profile of the App Connector Group is applied or overridden.

upgrade_day.description: Service Edges in this group will attempt to update to a newer version of the software during this specified day.

upgrade_time_in_secs.description: Service Edges in this group will attempt to update to a newer version of the software during this specified time.

block.description: List of trusted network IDs.

tcp_quick_ack_app.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

tcp_quick_ack_assistant.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

tcp_quick_ack_read_assistant.description: Whether TCP Quick Acknowledgement is enabled or disabled for the application. The tcpQuickAckApp, tcpQuickAckAssistant, and tcpQuickAckReadAssistant fields must all share the same value.

block.description: tcp port range
udp port range

double_encrypt.description: Whether Double Encryption is enabled or disabled for the app.

health_reporting.description: Whether health reporting for the app is Continuous or On Access. Supported values: NONE, ON_ACCESS, CONTINUOUS.

is_cname_enabled.description: Indicates if the Zscaler Client Connector (formerly Zscaler App or Z App) receives CNAME DNS records from the connectors.

name.description: Name of the application.

server_groups.description: List of the server group IDs.

tcp_port_ranges.description: TCP port ranges used to access the app.

udp_port_ranges.description: UDP port ranges used to access the app.
